mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Man_Com (man_com_cd, areacity_admin_cd, mem_cd, mem_lev_cd, fest_cd, exa_rep_cd, area_city_cd, area_cd, fest_nm, man_com_cat, man_com_nm1, man_com_dep, man_com_rank, com_mem_nm2, man_com_job, man_com_dt1, man_com_app, man_com_dt2, man_com_con) VALUES (#{man_com_cd}, #{areacity_admin_cd}, #{mem_cd}, #{mem_lev_cd}, #{fest_cd}, #{exa_rep_cd}, #{area_city_cd}, #{area_cd}, #{fest_nm}, #{man_com_cat}, #{man_com_nm1}, #{man_com_dep}, #{man_com_rank}, #{com_mem_nm2}, #{man_com_job}, #{man_com_dt1}, #{man_com_app}, #{man_com_dt2}, #{man_com_con})
